::Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::

Three misterous ladies arrived and they landed in a place where they 
could see Zardus and his enemies and where all could see them.

Aelo: Remeber that we can't fight in any side...
Celeno: Master forbide us...
Ocipite: and we'll obey him...




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> ::Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite::
> 
> The three misterous sisters saw the battle in Cibertron Fire and 
they 
> commented.
> 
> Aelo: It seems that this battle here it's bored...
> Celeno: Maximals are braves...
> Ocipite: But Alliance are good figthers...
> 
> Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: But alliance members are betrayers to 
Predacons' 
> goals
> 
> Aelo: Should we go and see their new base?
> Celeno: Master could not be agree with that...
> Ocipite: But we must know more about our new enemies...
> 
> They transformed and flew towards Iron Fist.
